Class ApiExceptionFilter

Namespace
Innovt.AspNetCore.Filters
Assembly
Innovt.AspNetCore.dll

An exception filter attribute for handling exceptions globally and providing standardized error responses.

[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.All)]
public sealed class ApiExceptionFilter : ExceptionFilterAttribute, IAsyncExceptionFilter, IExceptionFilter, IOrderedFilter, IFilterMetadata
